price: (Afiasefoͻ) mmienu no mu baako a yԑgyee no nkwa no, na mmerε tenten bi akyi ansa na ͻrekae (Yosef) no kaa sε: “Mεka (daeε no) asekyerε akyerε mo, enti monsoma me.”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرۡسِلُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī najā min'humā wa-iddakara baʿda ummatin anā unabbi-ukum bitawīlihi fa-arsilūni
